pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computing Word Alignment Using IBM Model 1 (and Symmetrization) for a Given Parallel Corpus and Its Evaluation // For a given Sentence-Aligned Parallel Corpus, it aligns words for each sentence pair. It considers one-to-many and symmetrization alignments. Moreover, it evaluates the quality of word alignment based on this package and some other software. It also builds an automatic dictionary of two languages based on given parallel corpus.
